text: "Scared to Be Lonely" is a 2017 song by Dutch DJ Martin Garrix and English singer Dua Lipa. It went to the top ten in Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, Germany, Hungary, Malaysia, the Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Portugal, Scotland, Slovakia, Sweden and Switzerland. It also reached #14 in Australia and the United Kingdom, #12 in Ireland and #76 in the United States. ==Track listings== *Digital download and streaming #"Scared to Be Lonely" – 3:40 *Digital EP – remixes, volume 1 #"Scared to Be Lonely" (Brooks remix) – 3:20 #"Scared to Be Lonely" (DubVision remix) – 3:10 #"Scared to Be Lonely" (Zonderling remix) – 3:54 #"Scared to Be Lonely" (Alpharock remix) – 3:55 #"Scared to Be Lonely" (Funkin Matt remix) – 3:38 #"Scared to Be Lonely" (Julien Earle remix) – 5:20 *Digital download and streaming – Brooks extended remix #"Scared to Be Lonely" (Brooks extended remix) – 4:35 *Digital download and streaming – DubVision extended remix #"Scared to Be Lonely" (DubVision extended remix) – 4:39 *Digital download and streaming – Zonderling extended remix #"Scared to Be Lonely" (Zonderling extended remix) – 4:50 *Digital EP – remixes, volume 2 #"Scared to Be Lonely" (Gigamesh remix) – 3:49 #"Scared to Be Lonely" (Medasin remix) – 3:32 #"Scared to Be Lonely" (Loud Luxury remix) – 3:27 #"Scared to Be Lonely" (Conro remix) – 3:22 #"Scared to Be Lonely" (LOOPERS remix) – 4:11 #"Scared to Be Lonely" (Joe Mason remix) – 3:27 *Digital download and streaming – Loud Luxury extended remix #"Scared to Be Lonely" (Loud Luxury extended remix) – 3:57 *Digital download and streaming – acoustic version #"Scared to Be Lonely" (acoustic version) – 4:17 Category:2017 songs Category:Dua Lipa songs Category:Martin Garrix songs
